name: Unique Educational Society
briefDescription: Unique Educational Society was registered in June 2006 to promote and disseminate skill training and More than 5000 trainees have been trained under different schemes and approximately 79% are successfully placed in leading industries.   Main goal of the organisation is to empower the youth through skill development and enhancement & to explore specific skill based livelihood opportunities available locally. This shall ensure optimal utilization of alternate livelihood options .
